description: This PR adds interactive greeting via `io::stdin()` and sets up the `lib.rs` library structure.

chapters.title: Interactive Greeting
chapters.description: Replace the static `println!` with an interactive prompt that reads the user's name from `stdin`.

hunks.note: Added stdin import and changed the greeting to read user input.

chapters.title: Library Setup
chapters.description: Create `src/lib.rs` with a public `greet` module and a `version()` function.

hunks.note: Helper function scaffolding for future use.
